channel.title: D claw error....plz help!
channel.description:
well currently i added d claws and d pl8s... i jsut finished adding in the specs for d claws... but i want to make it hit 4 times and also edit how high it hits....
currnetly it uses the dds spec animation i want it to use the darklight emote.... i got the emote but when it specs it usually only hits like 14-6 and i want it to hit higher and 4 times....with 1 spec
someone help plz?

item.title: D claw error....plz help!
item.dc:creator: @Master_Monk Master Monk
item.description:
@Master_Monk wrote:

Umm, for the higher hitting i could help, but the 4 hits gonna have to get someone else.

So you want to make them hit higher?

okay this is what you do…

Open up Item.cfg and at the Verrryy bottom Put this…

item = 8002 Dragon_Claws O_O_Nice_and_Shiny_Meow 1550000 1550000 1550000 120 10 10 10 10 10 10 10 10 12 100 10

Item = #### <—This number can be changed to whatever the dragon claws ID is on your server.

Read full topic
